Footer.description: Start a new investment journey with Cortex, the data-driven investment platform.

Hero.title:
Data Dominates the Market.

Less Emotion, More Strategy.
Hero.subtitle: Validate your investment ideas and automate them 24/7 on Cortex, the all-in-one quant platform for individual investors.
Hero.ctaButton: Test Your First Strategy for Free

FeatureSection.title: The Entire Investment Process in One Place
FeatureSection.subtitle: Cortex supports every step, from brainstorming ideas and verifying strategies to automated execution and sharing.

backtesting.title: Powerful Backtesting
backtesting.description: The past is a mirror to the future. Verify if your strategy actually worked with years of data in under a minute.

autoTrading.title: 24/7 Automated Trading
autoTrading.description: No more emotional intervention. Save your time by executing verified strategies flawlessly, 24/7.

community.title: A Growing Community
community.description: Investing alone is lonely. Share strategies with other investors and grow together through collective intelligence.

Auth.signupSubtitle: Create an account to experience data-driven investing.

errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
